XmlTableMap.source: select son.*,parent.Code as ParentCode, stuff((select '.'+code from S_A_Org where son.FullID like S_A_Org.FullID + '%' for xml path('')),1,1,'') as FullCode from S_A_Org son left join S_A_Org parent on parent.ID = son.ParentID

select S_EP_RevenueInfo_Detail.ID, case when org.Code = '' or org.Code is null then 'noData' else org.Code end OrgCode, case when org.Name = '' or org.Name is null then 'noData' else org.Name end OrgName, '无数据源字段' Number,'无数据源字段' Type,'无数据源字段' AccountType, '无数据源字段' CustomerCode,'无数据源字段' CustomerName,'无数据源字段' SalesUserCode, '无数据源字段' SalesUserName,'无数据源字段' SalesDeptCode,'无数据源字段' SalesDeptName, UnitCode ProjectCode,UnitName ProjectName,FactEndDate BussinessDate,FactEndDate ExpiredDate,FactEndDate RecDate,ModifyDate from S_EP_RevenueInfo_Detail inner join S_EP_RevenueInfo on S_EP_RevenueInfo_Detail.S_EP_RevenueInfoID = S_EP_RevenueInfo.ID left join EPM_Base..S_A_Org org on org.ID = S_EP_RevenueInfo_Detail.ChargerDept

select detail.ID ,detail.ID IncomeID,S_EP_CBSNode.Name ,S_EP_CBSNode.Code,1 Quantity,detail.IncomeValue Price,'无数据源字段' Unit ,'无数据源字段' TaxCode,isnull(detail.TaxRate,0) TaxRate,isnull(TaxValue,0) TaxValue,isnull(ClearIncomeValue,0) ClearValue ,isnull(detail.IncomeValue,0) TotalValue from S_EP_RevenueInfo_Detail detail inner join S_EP_CBSNode on detail.CBSNodeID = S_EP_CBSNode.ID

select apply.ID, case when org.Code = '' or org.Code is null then 'noData' else org.Code end OrgCode, case when org.Name = '' or org.Name is null then 'noData' else org.Name end OrgName, apply.SerialNumber,'无数据源字段' Type ,'无数据源字段' RelateUnitType,'无数据源字段' RelateUnit ,'无数据源字段' RelateUnitName,ApplyUser UserCode ,ApplyUserName UserName,ApplyDept UserDept ,ApplyDeptName UserDeptName,ApplyDate BussinessDate ,ApplyDate ExpiredDate,ApplyDate RecDate , case when S_EP_CBSNode.BusinessType = '' or S_EP_CBSNode.BusinessType is null then 'noData' else S_EP_CBSNode.BusinessType end BusinessType,case when S_EP_CostUnit.Code = '' or S_EP_CostUnit.Code is null then 'noData' else S_EP_CostUnit.Code end ProjectCode ,case when ProjectInfoName = '' or ProjectInfoName is null then 'noData' else ProjectInfoName end ProjectName,ModifyDate FROM S_EP_ReimbursementApply apply left join S_EP_CostUnit on S_EP_CostUnit.ID = apply.ProjectInfo left join S_EP_CBSNode on S_EP_CBSNode.ID = S_EP_CostUnit.CBSNodeID left join EPM_Base..S_A_Org org on org.ID = S_EP_CBSNode.ChargerDept

select ID,S_EP_ReimbursementApplyID ReimbursementID ,case when CostUnitName = '' or CostUnitName is null then 'noData' else CostUnitName end Name,case when CostUnit = '' or CostUnit is null then 'noData' else CostUnit end Code ,case when ChargerDept = '' or ChargerDept is null then 'noData' else ChargerDept end DeptCode,case when ChargerDeptName = '' or ChargerDeptName is null then 'noData' else ChargerDeptName end DeptName ,case when InvoiceType = '' or InvoiceType is null then 'noData' else InvoiceType end InvoiceType,'无数据源字段' TaxCode ,0 TaxRate,0 TaxValue,isnull(ApplyValue,0) ClearValue ,isnull(ApplyValue,0) ReimburseValue FROM S_EP_ReimbursementApply_Details

select apply.ID,apply.SerialNumber, case when org.Code = '' or org.Code is null then 'noData' else org.Code end OrgCode, case when org.Name = '' or org.Name is null then 'noData' else org.Name end OrgName, '无数据源字段' RelateUnitType,'无数据源字段' RelateUnitCode ,'无数据源字段' RelateUnitName,'无数据源字段' ReceiptUnitType,'无数据源字段' ReceiptUnitCode ,'无数据源字段' ReceiptUnitName,CreateDate BussinessDate,CreateDate RecData ,ModifyDate FROM T_F_LoanApply apply left join EPM_Base..S_A_Org org on org.ID = apply.OrgID

select ID,ID LoanID,'无数据源字段' SettleType,'无数据源字段' SettleTypeName ,'无数据源字段' PaymentPurpose,'无数据源字段' PaymentPurposeName,isnull(LoanValue,0) PaymentValue ,isnull(FactValue,0) PaymentActValue,'无数据源字段' Bank FROM T_F_LoanApply

select ID,Name,Code,'无数据源字段' GroupName,'无数据源字段' GroupCode ,'无数据源字段' ChargerDept,'无数据源字段' ChargerDeptName,'无数据源字段' ChargerUser ,'无数据源字段' ChargerUserName,Name InvoiceName , case when TaxAccounts = '' or TaxAccounts is null then 'noData' else TaxAccounts end TaxNo ,LinkTelphone ContactTel,Address ,'无数据源字段' TaxCategory,'0.06' DefaultTaxRate,'无数据源字段' DefaultInvoiceType ,ModifyDate FROM S_F_Customer

SELECT d.ID, case when org.Code = '' or org.Code is null then 'noData' else org.Code end OrgCode, case when org.Name = '' or org.Name is null then 'noData' else org.Name end OrgName, SerialNumber,BondType Type ,'无数据源字段' RelateUnitType,'无数据源字段' RelateUnitName,'无数据源字段' RelateUnitCode,'无数据源字段' ReceiptUnitType ,'无数据源字段' ReceiptUnitName,'无数据源字段' ReceiptUnitCode, ProjectCode, ProjectName,DepartInfo Dept ,DepartInfoName DeptName,d.ApplyDate BusinessDate,d.ApplyDate RecDate,ModifyDate FROM S_B_Bond d left join EPM_Base..S_A_Org org on org.ID = d.OrgID
SELECT ID,ID DepositID,'无数据源字段' SettleType,'无数据源字段' SettleName,'无数据源字段' Purpose ,'无数据源字段' PurposeName,Amount PaymentValue,Amount ActPaymentValue ,BankName Bank,'无数据源字段' ReceiptUnitBank FROM S_B_Bond

SELECT invoice.ID,case when org.Code = '' or org.Code is null then 'noData' else org.Code end OrgCode, case when org.Name = '' or org.Name is null then 'noData' else org.Name end OrgName,SerialNumber,case when S_F_Customer.Code = '' or S_F_Customer.Code is null then 'noData' else S_F_Customer.Code end CustomerCode ,case when S_F_Customer.Name = '' or S_F_Customer.Name is null then 'noData' else S_F_Customer.Name end CustomerName,S_EP_CBSNode.ChargerUser,S_EP_CBSNode.ChargerUserName ,S_EP_CBSNode.ChargerDept,S_EP_CBSNode.ChargerDeptName,IncomeUnit ProjectInfo ,IncomeUnitName ProjectInfoName,InvoiceDate,InvoiceDate ExpiredDate ,invoice.CreateDate RecDate,invoice.ModifyDate FROM S_C_Invoice invoice left join EPM_Base..S_A_Org org on org.ID = invoice.OrgID left join S_F_Customer on S_F_Customer.ID = invoice.CustomerID left join S_EP_IncomeUnit on S_EP_IncomeUnit.ID = invoice.IncomeUnit left join S_EP_CBSNode on S_EP_CBSNode.ID = S_EP_IncomeUnit.CBSNodeID

SELECT ID,ID InvoiceID,case when IncomeUnitName = '' or IncomeUnitName is null then 'noData' else IncomeUnitName end Name,case when IncomeUnitCode = '' or IncomeUnitCode is null then 'noData' else IncomeUnitCode end Code ,1 Quantity,Amount UnitPrice,case when TaxName = '' or TaxName is null then 'noData' else TaxName end TaxName ,TaxRate,TaxesAmount TaxValue,Amount InvoiceValue,ClearAmount ClearValue FROM S_C_Invoice

select ID, case when PaymentCode = '' or PaymentCode is null then 'noData' else PaymentCode end SerialNumber, '单据类型' Type, '往来单位类型' RelateUnitType,Supplier RelateUnitCode,SupplierName RelateUnitName, '收款单位类型' ReceiptUnitType,Supplier ReceiptUnitCode,SupplierName ReceiptUnitName, PaymentDate BusinessDate, CreateDate RecDate from S_SP_Payment

select ID, ID PaymentID, 'Name' Name, 'Code' Code, '结算方式编码' SettleType, '结算方式' SettleName,'付款用途编码' Purpose,'付款用途' PurposeName, PaymentValue, PaymentValue ActPaymentValue, BankAccount Bank from S_SP_Payment

SELECT receipt.ID ,case when org.Code = '' or org.Code is null then 'noData' else org.Code end OrgCode, case when org.Name = '' or org.Name is null then 'noData' else org.Name end OrgName ,'无数据源字段' SerialNumber , '无数据源字段' PaymentUnitType ,PayerUnit PaymentUnit ,PayerUnitName PaymentUnitName ,'无数据源字段' RelateUnitType ,'无数据源字段' RelateUnit ,'无数据源字段' RelateUnitName ,ArrivedDate ReceiptDate ,'无数据源字段' SalesUser ,'无数据源字段' SalesUserName ,'无数据源字段' SalesDept ,'无数据源字段' SalesDeptName ,'无数据源字段' ProjectCode ,'无数据源字段' ProjectName ,ModifyDate FROM S_C_Receipt receipt left join EPM_Base..S_A_Org org on org.ID = receipt.OrgID

SELECT ID,ID ReceiptID,ReceiptType SettleType,ReceiptType SettleTypeName,'无数据源字段' ReceiptPurpose ,'无数据源字段' ReceiptPurposeName,Amount ReceivableValue,Amount ReceiptValue,'无数据源字段' BankAccount FROM S_C_Receipt

SELECT invoice.ID,case when org.Code = '' or org.Code is null then 'noData' else org.Code end OrgCode, case when org.Name = '' or org.Name is null then 'noData' else org.Name end OrgName,'无数据源字段' SerialNumber,'' AccountType,case when S_SP_Supplier.Code = '' or S_SP_Supplier.Code is null then 'noData' else S_SP_Supplier.Code end SupplierCode ,case when S_SP_Supplier.Name = '' or S_SP_Supplier.Name is null then 'noData' else S_SP_Supplier.Name end SupplierName,ChargerDept,S_EP_CBSNode.ChargerUserName ChargerName,S_EP_CBSNode.Code ProjectCode,S_EP_CBSNode.Name ProjectName ,InvoiceDate RecDate,InvoiceDate ExpiredDate,InvoiceDate BussinessDate,invoice.ModifyDate FROM S_SP_Invoice invoice left join S_EP_CostUnit on S_EP_CostUnit.ID = invoice.CostUnit left join S_EP_CBSNode on S_EP_CBSNode.ID = S_EP_CostUnit.CBSNodeID left join EPM_Base..S_A_Org org on org.ID = S_EP_CBSNode.ChargerDept left join S_SP_Supplier on S_SP_Supplier.ID = invoice.Supplier

SELECT invoice.ID,invoice.ID SPInvoiceID,case when S_EP_CBSNode.Name = '' or S_EP_CBSNode.Name is null then 'noData' else S_EP_CBSNode.Name end Name,case when S_EP_CBSNode.Code = '' or S_EP_CBSNode.Code is null then 'noData' else S_EP_CBSNode.Code end Code,1 Quantity,Amount UnitPrice ,'无数据源字段' TaxCode,invoice.TaxRate,TaxValue,isnull(ClearValue,0) ClearValue,Amount TotalPrice FROM S_SP_Invoice invoice left join S_EP_CostUnit on S_EP_CostUnit.ID = invoice.CostUnit left join S_EP_CBSNode on S_EP_CBSNode.ID = S_EP_CostUnit.CBSNodeID

SELECT ID,Name,Code,'无数据源字段' OrgName,'无数据源字段' OrgCode,'无数据源字段' SupplierType,SupplierLevel,ContactAddress Address ,'无数据源字段' ChargerDept,'无数据源字段' ChargerDeptName,'无数据源字段' ChargerUser,'无数据源字段' ChargerUserName,'无数据源字段' CreditCode ,'无数据源字段' TaxCategory,'无数据源字段' DefaultInvoiceType,0 DefaultTaxRate,ModifyDate FROM S_SP_Supplier

SELECT ID,Name,Code, case when ProjectType = '' or ProjectType is null then 'noData' else ProjectType end Type,ChargerDept,ChargerDeptName ,ChargerUser,ChargerUserName,'' BussinessType,Area,CreateDate ModifyDate FROM S_I_Project
